name: THE MINISTRY
description:
Dear Sergey Rostov:

Ministry of Information has not ignore you. We have carefully looked through your application for work in the Ministry. We are happy to announce that you're now hired. 

You'll be working in the class B, unfortunetly without your family. Your job is all about the citizens, You'll be answering all their questions that come everyday at any time.  

Our driver will pick You up tomorrow at 13 pm. Welcome to The Ministry.

GLORY TO THE GREAT LEADER!

Ministry of Information.

[Developer Blog]

Hello, everyone! Today I wanted to share one of my small projects, that I was building for the past couple of months. I'd like to see what you think about it, leave a comment!

P.S. The game is really small and can't be even compared to all these good games out here! I am a begining  'developer' atfter all...Gotta start with small things!
